structure.unit: Public Parks, Playgrounds And The Public Domain

law.catch_line: Trespassing In Parks; Destruction Of Park Property; Penalty
law.text: Any person who wilfully or maliciously drives cattle, horses or other animals, or any vehicle, on or across such grounds or ways, or destroys or removes any fence or railing on such grounds or ways, or plays games thereon, or otherwise interferes with or injures the work of the corporation having the care of the property so injured, shall be punished by a fine of not more than twenty dollars, which shall be paid over to such corporation.
